game.title: A Lost Friend
game.objective: Find your friend who has gone missing in the woods.
game.description: Your friend, a young adventurer named Aerin, has gone missing in the woods. You must find her before it's too late.
game.reward: A special magical item that will help you on your journey.

task.objective: Talk to the villagers to gather information about Aerin's disappearance.
task.description: Talk to the villagers in the village to see if they have any information about Aerin's disappearance. Some of them may have seen her heading into the woods, or they may know of any recent strange occurrences that could be related to her disappearance.

task.objective: Enter the woods and search for clues.
task.description: Enter the woods and search for any clues that may lead you to Aerin. Look for footprints, signs of a struggle, or any other evidence that could help you determine what happened to her.

task.objective: Follow the clues to find Aerin.
task.description: Follow the clues you find in the woods to try to locate Aerin's whereabouts.
